All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class SmallButton
extends javax.swing.JButton
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener

A better button class that has nice roll over effects. This class is borrowed (quite heavily, but with modifications) from the "Swing: Second Edition" book by Matthew Robinson and Pavel Vorobeiv. An excellent book on Swing.

Author:
Matthew Robinson, Pavel Vorobeiv, Paul Smith
See Also:
